titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to "History and Folklore of the Kootenais" by Rosa E. Causton and White Otter circa 1940
History and Folklore of the Kootenais by Rosa E. Causton and White Otter
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Darcie Hart Riedner

did.unittitle: "History and Folklore of the Kootenais" by Rosa E. Causton and White Otter

repository.corpname: Washington State University Libraries, Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections

did.abstract: This collection consists of a single item, "The History and Folklore of the Kootenai Indians" (typescript) by Rosa E. Causton and White Otter, circa 1940.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open and available for research use.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a single item, "The History and Folklore of the Kootenai Indians" (typescript, approximately 300 pages) by Rosa E. Causton and White Otter. Photocopies of the typescript are also included in the collection.
